resources.post: I do not wish to post publicly. But I will say that since when do we need proof of Jesus’ existence. History books, way outside the realm of religious context, contantly refer to the man Jesus. The real quetion is whether He did what they say and I have no reason to believe He didn’t. I enjoyyour blog and thank you for your work. I hope we canmeet one day. Peace. >.
